mapper.update:
update t_electricity_cabinet
name = #{name},
address = #{address},
longitude = #{longitude},
latitude = #{latitude},
product_key = #{productKey},
device_name = #{deviceName},
device_secret = #{deviceSecret},
usable_status = #{usableStatus},
online_status = #{onlineStatus},
model_id = #{modelId},
version = #{version},
fully_charged = #{fullyCharged},
service_phone = #{servicePhone},
business_time = #{businessTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
store_id = #{storeId},
franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId},
stock_status = #{stockStatus},
sn = #{sn},
exchange_type = #{exchangeType},
where id = #{id} and tenant_id = #{tenantId}
mapper.select: select 1 from t_electricity_cabinet where product_key = #{productKey} and device_name = #{deviceName} and del_flag = 0 limit 1;
select 1 from t_electricity_cabinet where warehouse_id = #{wareHouseId} limit 1;
mapper.update:
update t_electricity_cabinet
franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId},
name = #{name},
store_id = #{storeId},
address = #{address},
longitude = #{longitude},
latitude = #{latitude},
stock_status = 1
where id in
#{id}

update t_electricity_cabinet set franchisee_id = #{targetFranchiseeId}, store_id = #{targetStoreId} where franchisee_id = #{sourceFranchiseeId} and store_id = #{sourceStoreId} and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and id = #{id}
